## Checklist

- [ ] Tests added/updated for behavior changes
- [ ] `go test ./...` passes
- [ ] `go vet ./...` passes
- [ ] Docs updated (`README.md`, `GETTING_STARTED.md`, or `docs/*`) if behavior changed
- [ ] Security impact reviewed (signing, verification, policy, install, scan paths)

## Risk and rollout

Describe any compatibility or security risks, and how to validate this change after merge.
